Control Name: REL 2.4 Prefer hub-and-spoke topologies over many-to-many mesh
Control Statement: If more than two network address spaces (for example, VPCs and on-premises networks) are connected via VPC peering, AWS Direct Connect, or VPN, then use a hub-and-spoke model, like that provided by AWS Transit Gateway.

control_attributes.Control: REL 2.4 Prefer hub-and-spoke topologies over many-to-many mesh
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you plan your network topology?
